AKEY_MISMATCH.message: AKey does not match with given URL param

MISSING_AUTHORIZATION.message: Missing authorization header. Ensure that API Key is provided as Bearer token within Authorization header

UNKNOWN_AUTHORIZATION.message: Authorization key invalid or not found. Ensure to send a Bearer Token within Authorization header

AKEY_NOT_REGISTERED.message: Provided AKey has not been registered

INVALID_SYNC_FORMAT.message: Sync object is invalid. Ensure to provide telemetry object and its data and / or location object
